channel.title: Visual Odometry on Henri Rebecq
channel.description: Recent content in Visual Odometry on Henri Rebecq

item.title: New paper accepted at RA-L and ICRA!
item.description: Our paper EVO: A Geometric Approach to Event-based 6-DOF Parallel Tracking and Mapping in Real-time has been accepted for publication in the Robotics and Automation Letters (RA-L), and for presentation at ICRA’17!
